testcase.classname: To validate the behavior of Whatsapp Web when the application is opened in two tabs of the same browser
testcase.name: User should be notified if whatsapp application is open in some other tab of the same browser
testcase.system-out: Given The user launches Chrome Browser......................................passed Given Login screen of whatsapp web application is displayed.................passed When User opens whatsapp web application in a new tab.......................passed And Switches back to previous tab...........................................passed Then A popup with the message _Whatsapp is open in another window. Click _Use Here_ to use WhatsApp in this window_ should be displayed with _CLOSE_ & _USE HERE_ options.passed

testcase.classname: To validate the behavior of Whatsapp Web when the application is opened in two tabs of the same browser
testcase.name: Login page of whatsapp should get loaded by clicking on _USE HERE_ and in the previous tab the popup should be displayed.
testcase.system-out: Given The user launches Chrome Browser......................................passed Given A popup with the message _ Whatsapp is open in another window. Click _Use Here_ to use WhatsApp in this window_ and options _CLOSE_ & _USE HERE_ is displayed.passed When User clicks on _USE HERE_ option.......................................passed Then Login page of whatsapp should get loaded...............................passed And Login page of whatsapp should get loaded................................passed And In the previous tab, popup with message _Whatsapp is open in another window. Click _Use Here_ to use WhatsApp in this window_ and options _CLOSE_ & _USE HERE_ should be displayed.passed

testcase.classname: To validate the behavior of Whatsapp Web when the application is opened in two tabs of the same browser
testcase.name: Whatsapp home screen should be displayed on clicking on _CLOSE_ option
testcase.system-out: Given The user launches Chrome Browser......................................passed Given The popup with the message _ Whatsapp is open in another window. Click _Use Here_ to use WhatsApp in this window_ and options _CLOSE_ & _USE HERE_ is displayed.passed When User clicks on _CLOSE_ option..........................................passed Then Whatsapp.com page should get loaded....................................passed
